name: PG Enterprises
tag_list: linux-hosting, hosting, canada-hosting, canada, shared-hosting, web-hosting, vps, vps-hosting, dedicated
overview:
The History of PG Enterprises

It all started in 2005 when owner Mike Holownych decided to begin reselling web hosting services. In a matter of months the first PG Enterprises website, packages, and feature set was developed. From the onset PG Enterprises set out to offer superior web hosting for a low price. By creating competitve packages, selecting the right partners, and hiring the first round of employees PG Enterprises quickly gained a great reputation with both customers and with industry analysts.

PG Enterprises strives to continue providing the best service for the best price. With HostNine’s Reseller Central software at their disposal, PG Enterprises is able to offer website hosting in over 10 locations on either cPanel Linux or Plesk Windows servers as part of our international offering. Goals of PG Enterprises

Today we hope to be the best web hosting provider that becomes your final destination for your shared linux, shared Windows and dedicated server hosting. Our team in conjunction with our partners has put many man hours into fine tuning processes, products and offering to stay competitive and value oriented. We have all worked very hard to secure a global network of servers available for your next project.

The future of hosting will bring massive changes in the upcoming years and the product development team is already hard at work evaluating new service, enhancing current product sets, and obsessing about the current infrastructure.

Please take a look around our site and contact us if you have any questions, comments, suggestions – or even complaints. Any and all feedback you provide will help us serve you better going forward!
